command: set -eo pipefail; uvx_bin="$PAL_UVX_BIN"; if [ -z "$uvx_bin" ]; then candidate="$(command -v uvx 2>/dev/null || true)"; if [ -n "$candidate" ] && [ -x "$candidate" ]; then uvx_bin="$candidate"; elif [ -x "$HOME/.local/bin/uvx" ]; then uvx_bin="$HOME/.local/bin/uvx"; elif [ -x "/opt/homebrew/bin/uvx" ]; then uvx_bin="/opt/homebrew/bin/uvx"; elif [ -x "/usr/local/bin/uvx" ]; then uvx_bin="/usr/local/bin/uvx"; fi; fi; if [ -z "$uvx_bin" ] || [ ! -x "$uvx_bin" ]; then echo "uvx not found. Install uv (uvx), set PAL_UVX_BIN, or put uvx on PATH." >&2; exit 1; fi; default_model="$PAL_DEFAULT_MODEL"; if [ -z "$default_model" ]; then default_model="auto"; fi; export DEFAULT_MODEL="$default_model"; from="$PAL_MCP_FROM"; if [ -z "$from" ]; then from="git+https://github.com/BeehiveInnovations/pal-mcp-server.git"; fi; exec "$uvx_bin" --from "$from" pal-mcp-server
